DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Genetic Abnormality Test Performed Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to identify other genetic  abnormalities not otherwise specified for which a patient was tested.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Genetic Abnormality Test Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._Performed; carried out.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer.:A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: A molecular or cytogenetic abnormality which occurs in either human disease states or disease models.
A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.
Executed and carried through to completion.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by B. McClure-Shimel. mc 5/12/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
